item.title: Coding is an essential skill for future careers for the following four reasons
item.description:
September 12th, the 256th day of the year, is a significant date for programmers because the number 256 represents all the values possible within an eight-bit byte. This day is celebrated as International Programmerâ€™s Day. Dr. Daiana Beitler, Philanthropies Lead at Microsoft Asia, emphasizes how much we rely on the work of programmers. Our ability to connect with loved ones and shop online is thanks to their efforts. Microsoft highlights the importance of coding for several key reasons:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/coding-is-an-essential-skill-for-future-careers-for-the-following-four-reasons/
